basic.description: An intensive two-week course taken immediately after final examinations in second year (see Sessional Dates). Teams of students use geological field methods as the basis for an assessment of overburden and bedrock for a specific outcome. A final report is presented and defended. The cost of accommodation and food ($550 in 2009, but subject to change) will be borne by the student.
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Geological Field School

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite   GEOL221 and GEOL235, or permission of the Department.
